actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to extend the period for congressional review of the act passed by the Council of the District of Columbia entitled "The Location of Chanceries Amendment Act of 1979".

summary.text: Extends, from 30 days to 60 days, the period for congressional review of the Location of Chanceries Act, passed by the Council of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to extend the period for congressional review of the act passed by the Council of the District of Columbia entitled "The Location of Chanceries Amendment Act of 1979".
